mapper.insert: insert into acl_admin( username, password, name, phone) VALUES(#{username},#{password},#{name},#{phone})
mapper.select: select * from acl_admin where id=#{adminId} and is_deleted=0
mapper.update:
update acl_admin
username=#{username},
name=#{name},
phone=#{phone},
head_url=#{headUrl},
update_time=now()
where id=#{id}
update acl_admin set is_deleted=1 where id=#{adminId}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT acl_permission.`code` from acl_permission,acl_role_permission,acl_admin_role where acl_permission.id=acl_role_permission.permission_id and acl_role_permission.role_id=acl_admin_role.role_id and acl_admin_role.admin_id=#{adminId} and acl_permission.is_deleted=0 and acl_role_permission.is_deleted=0 and acl_permission.type=2 and acl_admin_role.is_deleted=0
